thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, Value for money
thread.title_full: Great location, Value for money - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: shazza4d
title: Great location, Value for money
text: Positioned in a great location near to Waterloo, ideally located for London eye, Westminster and Buckingham palace only a gory walk away. Near to tube and Various bus stops (London transport and tour bus) right outside hotel. Clean room, noise free and air conditioning available. Also great view from hotel window. Breakfast has a great selection and fitted our needs perfectly ! Will definitely be returning.
